description.np: राणा शासनको अन्त्य र लोकतन्त्रको स्थापनाको उत्सव।
description.en: Celebrates the end of the Rana regime and the establishment of democracy.
Commemorates the promulgation of the Constitution of Nepal.
Marks the establishment of democracy in Nepal.

description.np: नेपाललाई गणतन्त्रको रूपमा घोषणा गरिएको दिनको स्मरण।
description.en: Commemorates the declaration of Nepal as a republic in 2008.

description.np: नेपालको राष्ट्रिय झण्डालाई सम्मान गर्ने दिन।
description.en: Celebrates the national flag of Nepal.

description.np: नेपालका विभिन्न जातीय समूहहरूको एकताको स्मरण।
description.en: Commemorates the unity of various ethnic groups in Nepal.
Commemorates the restoration of democracy in Nepal.
Celebrates and honors the contributions of farmers.

description.np: नेपाली जनताको एकता र आत्मासम्मानको स्मरण।
description.en: Commemorates the unity and spirit of the Nepali people.
